definition: to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: And they will never forgive you for provoking the rise in Arab oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 你挑動阿拉伯石油漲價，他們永遠無法原諒。
